text:
Congraps, n\0!
You gotta new room in your house!
I sent you a congraplications
present. I hope ya wanna decorate
your new room with it!

2\0n\0!
You got a new room in your house
again, huh? That's real neat.
One more place to snack, right?!
I've sent you a gift to help you
decorate or something!

2\0n\0, I see your
house got bigger again.
What are you feeding it?
You can feed it this present
if you wanna!

2\0n\0! Two stories!
Man! We could play hide-and-seek
in your house so easy!
I sent you a gift so you can
decorate, but we COULD play
hide-and-seek instead!
